allow: Bash(docker exec supabase_db_war_memory psql -U postgres -d postgres -c "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM timeline_items WHERE NOT is_deleted;")

Bash(docker exec supabase_db_war_memory psql -U postgres -d postgres -c "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM timeline_items WHERE fallen_id = ''10000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001'' AND status = ''approved'' AND NOT is_deleted;")

Bash(docker exec supabase_db_war_memory psql -U postgres -d postgres -c "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comments WHERE fallen_id = ''10000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001'' AND NOT is_deleted AND NOT is_hidden;")
